table.sql: begin delete xxdr_build_app_content where appid='113'; insert into xxdr_build_app_content t ( appid, build_process, build_sequence, cust_param_1_varchar, cust_param_2_varchar, custom_chglog_filename, custom_chglog_filetype, custom_data_filename, custom_sql, custom_sql_runalways, deploy_sequence, exclude_deploy_y_n, folder_name, included_y_n, object_name, object_type, order_by_clause, where_clause) select x.appid, x.build_process, x.build_sequence, x.cust_param_1_varchar, x.cust_param_2_varchar, x.custom_chglog_filename, x.custom_chglog_filetype, x.custom_data_filename, case when length(x.custom_sql)=0 then null else x.custom_sql end as custom_sql, x.custom_sql_runalways, x.deploy_sequence, x.exclude_deploy_y_n, x.folder_name, x.included_y_n, x.object_name, x.object_type, case when length(x.order_by_clause)=0 then null else x.order_by_clause end as order_by_clause, case when length(x.where_clause)=0 then null else x.where_clause end as where_clause from xmltable ('/table/tabledata/row' passing xmltype(:1) columns appid varchar2(250) path 'column[@name eq "appid"]' , build_process varchar2(10) path 'column[@name eq "build_process"]' , build_sequence number path 'column[@name eq "build_sequence"]' , cust_param_1_varchar varchar2(500) path 'column[@name eq "cust_param_1_varchar"]' , cust_param_2_varchar varchar2(500) path 'column[@name eq "cust_param_2_varchar"]' , custom_chglog_filename varchar2(500) path 'column[@name eq "custom_chglog_filename"]' , custom_chglog_filetype varchar2(500) path 'column[@name eq "custom_chglog_filetype"]' , custom_data_filename varchar2(500) path 'column[@name eq "custom_data_filename"]' , custom_sql clob path 'column[@name eq "custom_sql"]' , custom_sql_runalways varchar2(10) path 'column[@name eq "custom_sql_runalways"]' , deploy_sequence number path 'column[@name eq "deploy_sequence"]' , exclude_deploy_y_n varchar2(50) path 'column[@name eq "exclude_deploy_y_n"]' , folder_name varchar2(50) path 'column[@name eq "folder_name"]' , included_y_n varchar2(50) path 'column[@name eq "included_y_n"]' , object_name varchar2(50) path 'column[@name eq "object_name"]' , object_type varchar2(50) path 'column[@name eq "object_type"]' , order_by_clause clob path 'column[@name eq "order_by_clause"]' , where_clause clob path 'column[@name eq "where_clause"]' ) x; end;
